title: Hi, can anyone point me in the right direction please?
content:
I'm looking for the name of the font below… Much appreciated, thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/posters_6744.jpeg)
author: higashi

comments.content:
Nothing convincing, only very loosely similars that would need customization. Could even be hand-drawn (looks a bit clumsy).  
Some I like: [Saa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/saa/), [Revolution Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/revolution-gothic/), [TX Manifesto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typebox/tx-manifesto/), [Mazurquica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/latinotype/mazurquica/), [Inventory](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/inventory/), [Canby](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/canby/), [Nicotine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/chank/nicotine/), [Nomad](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/coniglio/nomad/), [Refrigerator Deluxe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/refrigerator-deluxe/), [Route 66](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/route-66-nf/), [Liquorstore](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/chank/liquorstore/), [Olifant](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hipopotam/olifant/), [Stahlbetontraeger](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.dafont.com/stahlbetontraeger.font), [Opelln2001](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.dafont.com/opeln2001.font), [Berlin Email](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.peter-wiegel.de/Fonts/index.html)

One of those loosely similars:  
Dawnland/Massiva Grotesq W00 Q  
 [http://www.fonts.com/font/dawnland/massiva-grotesq](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549/http:/www.fonts.com/font/dawnland/massiva-grotesq)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404125549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/molt1_4893.jpg)

Stahlbetontraeger: It's based on Stahlbeton. Does Stahlbeton's license allow Nils von Blanc to "remix" it, and if so does it further allow him to apparently\* make money from it?

\* "IF YOU WANT TO USE THIS FONT COMMERCIAL: PLEASE SENT A EMAIL ...."

Opelln2001: Looking at Barmee's other fonts on Dafont, I would caution against recommending/using it.

hhp

Hi..

I'm in two minds as to wether to put you out of your misery.. and have the font used all over the shop.. or keep schtum ;).

It is a font, with a special character... but I kinda like that it's unique at the moment - so may keep it under my hat.. bribes accepted though ;-)

If anyone gets it.. I'll send you a bag of Coffee ..

Jamie
